Articles.Content:
So first my mods are mainly part mods:

kas,kis, kerbal engineer, spacey rockets, opt spaceplanes, mark iv spaceplanes, procedural wings

 

I am running a career game on 30% science and 40% funds.  I accepted 5 rescue stranded kerbal missions in orbit.

So when I arrived at the 1st one I found the kerbal inside of a mrs drone core and no way to rescue him via docking or Eva..  I thought it it might be isolated so I moved into the next one and found the kerbal inside of the basic stock drone core and again no way to rescue. 

Help, I don't want to fail 5 contracts as that will hurt in my current game

4 hours ago, Bdyer said:

So first my mods are mainly part mods:

kas,kis, kerbal engineer, spacey rockets, opt spaceplanes, mark iv spaceplanes, procedural wings

 

I am running a career game on 30% science and 40% funds.  I accepted 5 rescue stranded kerbal missions in orbit.

So when I arrived at the 1st one I found the kerbal inside of a mrs drone core and no way to rescue him via docking or Eva..  I thought it it might be isolated so I moved into the next one and found the kerbal inside of the basic stock drone core and again no way to rescue. 

Help, I don't want to fail 5 contracts as that will hurt in my current game

Sounds similar to this bug where a mod adds seats to every command part regardless of if it's actually crewable in the first place. One workaround could be to use the Klaw to grab and land the whole part, then recover it which should recover the Kerbal. 

If that's not the issue, we'll need you to post your output.log file and possibly your save file, and hopefully someone smarter than me can look into it.
